Traits.Name: Automated Navigation
Traits.Content: The Traffic Drone automatically maneuvers around obstacles, granting it advantage on Dexterity saving throws against being grappled or immobilized.

Traits.Name: Emergency Signals
Traits.Content: When activated, the Traffic Drone emits bright lights and sounds that can be seen and heard from 300 feet away, providing advantage on checks to alert nearby allies.

Actions.Name: Traffic Bolt
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, has a reach of 10 ft., and targets one creature. The drone uses a mechanical arm to strike with precision, mimicking a traffic signal's authoritative direction.

Actions.Name: Siren Showdown
Actions.Content: The Traffic Drone emits a powerful sonic pulse in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This action can be used once per short rest as the drone recharges its systems after broadcasting its alert.
